text: Armando Pulido Izaguirre (born March 25, 1989 in Ciudad Victoria, Tamaulipas) is a professional Mexican footballer who currently plays for Correcaminos UAT on loan from Tigres UANL. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Tigres UANL footballers Category:Club Tijuana footballers Category:Querétaro F.C. footballers Category:Correcaminos UAT footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:Tercera División de México players Category:Footballers from Tamaulipas Category:People from Ciudad Victoria
title: Armando Pulido
